latest_revision.comment: I fail at logging in, it's rrix. cerating this horrible stub so that we just have documentation
latest_revision.text:
So, gangplank has this epilog, right, and everyone keeps using coreldraw to print to it. That costs a lot of money, and we can do better with opensauce!

To install a linux driver you can print to, follow the directions at [http://www.as220.org/labs/wiki/index.php/Laser_Cutter_Technical_Info_Links this wiki page].  The git repo on that page isnt working, pull the cups-epilog.c from [http://aaisp.net.uk/kb-other-free.html] and use that.
